post.body: I wish they wouldn't touch me there its to scary!
I like the wall but Alex and Amanda keeps knowing down the wall!
I wish I could lock my heart away without someone coming into my life and knocking down the wall that I have built around my heart!
I hate love it hurts to much!
why do people care why can't they just forget about me and tell me they don't love me but really mean it!
I'm tired of my feelings! I don't want to feel anymore! I hate it cause I'm scared to be loved!
but in all truth I run to be alone and that's what I need for 2day and it doesn't matter what 2days!
I run to hide but I hide to run!
Im depressed but i'm ok i wish i knew why i'm scared!
check this site but don't if your ganna try to stop me:www.thegirliwas.SynthaSite.com
i can't be the one to let myself hurt anyone anymore i'm sorry Alex and Amanda! i'm not going to let me drag u down please forgive me!
I feel that to day is the day to finally do what i've been saying that i'm ganna do and that is suicide!
Alex your the sexiest man live and no one can ever take your place in my heart!
I'm so sorry Alex and Amanda!
I'm depressed but I don' know why!
